message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which holds significant value for you at $12000. I believe it would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Considering its worth and the opportunity it presents, I am offering you the chance to acquire it for $10000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value and your budget, while ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.
